text: Tobias Rosen is a German film producer, best known for his film, Watu Wote/All of Us for which he received critical acclaim and received an Academy Award nomination for Academy Award for Best Live Action Short Film. ==Awards and nominations== * Nominated: Academy Award for Best Live Action Short Film ==References== ==External links== * Category:1980s births Category:Living people Category:German film producers Category:Film people from Nuremberg
title: Tobias Rosen
